item.description:
This event will be held at: Butcher Shop & Fish Market in Hampton Falls; it has a sign with the bull and lobster on it. I'm not sure if the official address and nothing pulls up on the web. The location is located right on Route 1 just north of Ace Hardware. If you miss that, it's next to the nude ladies dancing place, right smack dab on the border with Seabrook and Hampton Falls.

This session is to discuss upcoming legislation at the New Hampshire State House and to discuss talking points that can be utilized during public hearings, etc.
item.name: Legislative Meeting
